                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              * 7/13/22 Volume 104
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              * Had a scare right on the last fucking day of the project. Windows fucking lost my D drive. Luckily, I just needed to reboot and it came back
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              * Chapter 1045
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              * According to Kaido, Paramecia awakenings change the surroundings, Zoan awakenings change the body. That’s consistent with everything we’ve seen up until now. Luffy’s fruit transforms him and his surroundings so it is neither strictly a Zoan or Paramecia awakening
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              * Luffy has done the running-sonic-the-hedgehog-wheel-feet thing back during Alabasta. He also left a trail of fire when running back in Punk Hazard
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              * It’s Time           This picture depicts clearly a yet unstated effect of the Nika powers and that is the ability to share the powers with allies. I call it the Nika AOE for obvious reasons. This power has been in the story for a very long time. I first noticed it in Alabasta but there are probably earlier examples that I missed. As you can see Luffy’s allies: Law, Kid, Chopper, Nami and Tama all have the same Nika eye-pops while Kaido’s jobbers have the same eye-pops Oda has been using since the beginning.    Notice that Oda felt the need to draw five separate characters, each with various levels of loyalty to Luffy all sharing the expression that is linked to his new powers. What I believe happens, is when Luffy considers someone an ally, he unconsciously transfers some of his powers to them. Notice how Tama, who was not initially part of the raid is also affected. I’m not even sure Luffy and her have crossed paths this evening, and her announcement for everyone to switch happened while Luffy was off the island.             So I don’t think Luffy is consciously choosing who to affect with the AOE; I think he just spreads it to people he considers Nakama. Luffy has always been governed by cartoon physics but so have a lot of the Strawhats. The first example that started me down this thought process was Usopp’s fight with Mr.4 and Ms. Christmas. Usopp leaves him-shaped holes in the walls when he is smashed through them                                              Now, Usopp isn’t the first character besides Luffy to manifest these traits, but it is weird because so far Usopp was one of the only characters who didn’t have a devil fruit whose body was acting strangely. In the same fight-arc the pin-cushion Baroque lady actually does do a sort of Popeye power where she injects herself with her needles to make herself stronger. Also in that same fight-arc Sanji’s lust-heart-eye gets smacked directly by Mr. 2.                              According to my notes the tooniness of the world seems to drop off severely after Alabasta but another thing I found is that Yosuku is instantly healed from scurvy when given Lime juice. Notably he was given the juice after Zoro introduced him and Johnny as friends of his.                                         Going forward in the story past Alabasta, the next example I found was on Enes Lobby, and at this point my notes start referring to it as the AOE directly. The Strawhats crash the Rocketman and get out completely unscathed. And I think it is this page that completely solidified the idea in my mind. Ch. 400 Pg. 8                                   The fact that Franky is saying that none of them are normal and the light damage everyone took is “ridiculous” and Luffy’s powers are described as “ridiculous” in the story makes me think that this is an effect of the Nika. The next thing I have comes from Brook in Thriller Bark where he drinks milk to heal himself. While most of the Strawhats, including Brook himself, don’t consider him joined at the moment, Luffy does. Not that it matters anyway because Luffy gives the powers to even passing acquaintances, see Kokoro and Chimney. But what’s weird to me about Brook is that he says the part about milk with confidence, as if he’s already tried this before meeting Luffy and it worked. My notes go dark for a while on this topic aside from the occasional snark about how the Nika silhouette appears everywhere. The next instance is on Whole Cake Island. I should note, I read one volume a day for months, so though I didn’t make a note of it every time I saw it the idea for the Nika AOE was slowly gestating, changing from just a joke to an actual theory. By the time I reached Whole Cake Island I actually believed it. And then this happens,                                                                                          Depicted is Yonji getting his face, very cartoonishly, smashed in with a hydraulic press. When I intially saw this I thought, ‘finally the proof I need to disprove this stupid joke-theory’ unfortunately in the month or so since I read it I actually realized that this is congruent with the theory. At this point in the story, Luffy is not aware of Sanji’s family issues. He has also met two of Sanji’s family members personally and one of them saved his life. All he knows is that this is his beloved cook’s younger brother and his older sister just saved his life. Why wouldn’t Luffy think they’re friendly? They don’t really say anything Luffy would find objectionable like ‘oshiruku is gross’. But there is an even bigger piece of evidence in Whole Cake Island                                                                                   This was actually one of the first pieces of evidence people cited when discussing how far back the nika fruit went, but most people missed the fact that Brook also recovered in the same way. Notice how that gangster yells, ‘how do your bodies even work?’ That line about bodies happens often and I think that that is how Oda signals to the audience that this is the Nika AOE and not just a regular gag like this one.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   And this milk scene is even more of a smoking gun when you consider the SBS question pertaining to it.                  At this point I believe the Nika AOE 100%, I know some people think the SBS is bullshit but they’re wrong. Oda spoils a lot in the SBS but he usually does it pretty sneakily. For example in Volume 15 (Little Garden) the SBS depicted the christening of the Going Merry, except the bottle didn’t break and Oda explicitly states that’s bad luck for the ship. So yes, I believe that this is really happening and I believe that beyond a shadow of a doubt. Any way I’ve been writing this dot alone for over 2 hours so I’ll just round up the last pieces I have: 926 Kid fattens up and he is technically an ally since he has helped and never directly opposed Luffy, 947 Old man Hyo gets his head stuck in a wall and his neck stretches as Luffy pulld him out, 1044 Kaido. Kaido is a bit strange and is certainly a counterpoint but there is overwhelming evidence in favor. I think it can just be explained as Luffy spewing his power everywhere because he doesn’t completely understand it yet.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              * So yeah, that’s the Nika AOE, I don’t really like the idea of Luffy sharing his powers but I can’t really deny it either. I actually like that he uses cartoony powers in his fights though, it gets One Piece back to its roots instead of Dragon Ball. Speaking of which, re-reading this arc, Oda was trying so hard to make his own Super Saiyan moment. Between Luffy dying, the fact that he’s fighting ‘the strongest evah’, and even the hair color it's clear he was mimicking Super Saiyan. I’d say he even succeeded given all the hype I saw that chapter    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              * Luffy gets old as the powers dissipate. So far this hasn’t been expanded on and he was completely fine after he won
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              * His hair and clothes are all white. The fruit may very well be double-secretly named and its true name is the manga-manga fruit. I only say this, and I mean only, because there is that comic about the Germa 66 that has heroes and villains in it.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *  Luffy spouts a list of names before he transforms again. I got nothing. I can’t see any connection between them.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              * Kaido describes the transformation as ‘pure white’
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              * Kaido’s down
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              * Jesus fuk that was only the first chapter, its 10 I started at 7
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Chapter 1046
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Luffy’s heartbeat plays as Zunesha reminisces so that it is explicitly clear what he’s referring to
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Kaido says a lot of words to just say ‘An awakening is using your power to the fullest’
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Sanji didn’t abandon the prostitutes
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Usopp’s affected. Those are very clearly circles not triangles, and he hasn’t been anywhere near Luffy since his awakening                                                
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Chapter 1047
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Roger officially had no fruit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Luffy is still weak to slash somehow
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * “I think fans would be disappointed if Luffy just punches Kaido hard”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Chapter 1048

Now it actually kind of works because there isn’t a week to wait
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Chapter 1049
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Kaido had horns before the fruit

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       * Chapter 1050
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       * I said it before I’ll say it again, it was a huge fucking mistake to have the narrator be wrong about the winner of that battle
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       * The samurai say Momo had a ‘fruit power’ I thought the Wano-ese call them jutsus
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       * Zunesha seems sad about the border
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       * The Beast Pirates are right to keep fighting, Luffy got back up twice, why shouldn’t they believe Kaido would too?
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       * Kaido and (probably) Big Mom dying in lava
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       * I wonder if these earthquakes could be caused by a certain fruit. At least I wondered that when I first read the chapter, I don’t think Blackbeard would sit around for a week.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       * Chapter 1051
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       *                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             * Chapter 1052
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * I think this CP0 agent might be a long-arms. Look at his right arm           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * I think that guy teaching the kids is the same guy who read off all of Oden’s crimes during his introduction
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * The death count is way too low. There were ten retainers and only two died. Kin was literally split in half and crushed by Kaido
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * I don’t know why Momo is going for Nami. Yamato is right there and I’m sure she’d let him do anything to her as long as he wears the plate
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             * Chapter 1053
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             * CP0 encountered Big Mom Pirates and then stopped transmitting
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             * Tengu refers to her as Nico Robin not Orobi or some other such nonsense
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             * I’d probably have a lot to say about Sukiyaki but I’ve been at this for 4 hours already
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             * Pluton is in Wano. I wish Robin would read the Poneglyph she’s standing in front of to the audience
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             * I don’t really get Ryokugyu, his motivations and opinions on Akainu aren’t very consistent. But hey maybe we’ll learn some dark secret about his past that will make everything clear. My guess is he’s Nami’s biological brother
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             * Luffy still has Nika eyes
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             * The new four emperors are announced, Luffy, Shanks, Buggy, and Blackbeard. The reveal panel actually mimics the cover of volume 25.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             * Ryokugyu is restoring the plants as he walks towards the capital
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             * 7/14/22 Etc.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             * Conclusions
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             * Well that was certainly a project. I’m actually a little surprised at myself for sticking through this all the way. Originally, I was just going to read to refresh myself and see if there were any details about Nika but around volume 4 I realized that I had a lot of thoughts on a lot of things so I started to take notes and I’m really glad I did.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             * Viz really needs to go through this entire thing and re-translate it. There are so many little errors throughout the entire run. They still call him Zolo to this day. And the stuff is especially bad towards the front.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             * I don’t really have an opinion on Wano, it was certainly better the second time around but it’s still long as fuck and not over yet. The curtains still haven’t closed on Act 3 and I’m not ruling out the possibilities of Acts 4 and 5. For those who don’t know a lot of the stuff in Wano is based on Kabuki plays and those are typically 5 acts. I really hope that isn’t the case, I’m sick of Wano. We've been here for 4 years. But at the same time there’s a bunch of dangling plot threads in Wano. And they also can’t leave yet because they still haven’t found Kaido’s Road Poneglyph
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             * Is Shank’s evil? Idk. Right at the start of this project I found what I thought to be pretty definitive evidence in that the narrator explicitly calls Shanks a good man but that was before the chapter where the narrator put his foot in his mouth about Kaido v. Luffy so that’s worthless.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             * What is the One Piece? Honestly, I don’t care. At this point I’m more interested in the secret history and any treasure the One Piece is could only disappoint this far into the story.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             * Nika AOE. I’m not sure if I made this clear but I actually really don’t like the idea that Luffy is rubberizing his allies. There was just too much evidence to deny that it was happening. There is probably even more evidence that I missed. I just checked Sanji’s introduction and he doesn’t do the heart-eye thing until after Luffy asks him to join. The first time he does it is when he meets Nami which is after he feeds Gin.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             * Do I still like One Piece? Yes
